rows.label: tlk70000048_06_msg0001
rows.name: Do you remember what I told you before?

rows.label: tlk70000048_06_msg0002
rows.name:
About how important it is to share
your happiness and grief with others
in times of great hardship?

rows.label: tlk70000048_06_msg0003
rows.name:
There are a lot of things that
wouldn't be possible without you
all, and I don't just mean this fight.

rows.label: tlk70000048_06_msg0004
rows.name:
There isn't anyone else who
can do for us what you do...

rows.label: tlk70000048_06_msg0005
rows.name:
So please, just... Take
care of yourselves.
